title: Ludum Dare Submissions
description: A game jam competition where I was given 48 hours to develop a game that fits the given theme. I participated in several of these and created my entries with HTML5 and JavaScript. Some entries used the enchant.js framework.
linkText: To view my submissions with included source code click here.

title: School Projects
description: Through my various computer science classes at the University of Minnesota, I’ve developed several advanced programming projects. Pictured above is my implementation of the k-means algorithm which was executed in Python.
linkText: To view my what school projects I’ve done and source code, click here.

title: Web Development
description: Using WordPress and React, I have developed a website for author Mary Bleckwehl. She uses her website professionally to schedule school visits and promotes her upcoming projects.
linkText: To see more details into how I developed Mary’s website and this one, click here.
